Services


Individual therapy

Individual therapy is a one on one form of therapy facilitated in a safe, caring, and confidential environment.

My specialties include:

  • Children impacted by child sexual abuse or neglect.
  • Children demonstrating problematic sexual behavior.
  • Families impacted by child abuse or neglect.

Concerns may include:

  • Trauma
  • Impulse control
  • Coping skills
  • Interpersonal relationships


Family Therapy

Family therapy is required as I work with children impacted by child sexual abuse and/or problematic sexual behaviors. I use a trauma focused cognitive behavioral therapy (TF-CBT) approach which illustrates that at least one caregiver be present and involved throughout the childâ€™s treatment to provide additional support for the child and to receive psycho-education about the presenting concerns.
